alert.note: Alert for Chester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 6:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Chester County through 715 PM EDT... At 633 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chester, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Chester State Park, Lowrys and Cornwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
